name: Candyfront Demo - Devlog 1.5 Demo
description:
Candyfront Demo -for Devlog 1.5

Greetings humans, this is  a Demo I am releasing to friends and people of the online world. Please only choose singleplayer mode. Multiplayer will not work, even though it is completed. Donate only if you want to.  Feedback will be replied to and feedback is much appreciated. 

Youtube channel for more: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrFMUAoxx10bkOYHgtbwucQ

*IMPORTANT* ESC to escape game at any time. 

WASD movement. Not arrow keys.
